about_the_game: The demo allows the player to play a 2*2 grid with all 6 colours and a randomised initial start of 20 flips. The player can play unlimited turns and all other features can be modified as per the actual game.
detailed_description: The demo allows the player to play a 2*2 grid with all 6 colours and a randomised initial start of 20 flips. The player can play unlimited turns and all other features can be modified as per the actual game.

short_description: Game of Squares is a pattern matching 2D game inspired by the Rubik's cube,. Customise the game's rules to your liking. Challenge yourself by getting faster.
